title: Game Scoop Episode 599
description: Game of the Year Watch continues with The Last of Us Part 2, Hades, Ghost of Tsushima, Animal Crossing, and more. Your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- also discuss the PlayStation 5 UI, the Xbox Series X launch lineup, and D-pads. This episode features music from Werewolf and Blaster Master on NES. The final track is Daemon's song "Control You."
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
